name: Princess.Loot.Pixel.Again x2
description:
- The continuation of (un)popular game Princess.Loot.Pixel.Again
- Lots of fun without any hints of seriousness
- A procedurally generated adventure
- x2 is much more artefacts, items,locations, enemies, bosses, secrets and traps
- The original graphic style of pixel-comix (according to the developer)
- 12 unic characters with their own features
- PLPA x2 is filled with funny things, irregular situations, easter-eggs and references to other games and films
- More and more achievements! Well, not too much, but something like that…
- Full controller support
- Mario blocks!
- Unique 8-bit drum-n-bass O_o
- Did you see it before? Yes, sure!
